attributes.action: to continue to pay carers allowence to people of pensionable age regardless of the amount of state pension received
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on reaching pension age because of having paid a full stamp and not a reduced contributions everyone receiving more than the carers allowence in pension payment is therefore disqualified and will longer receive the carers allowance

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/OAPCarers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
